items.title: A 'covered call' options strategy for investors betting on future Netflix gains — while mitigating risk
items.description: Michael Khouw breaks down how to structure a covered call options trade on Netflix.

items.title: Deutsche Bank raises Micron price target ahead of earnings next week
items.description: Deutsche Bank sees shares of Micron rising 11% from here.

items.title: Citi upgrades Union Pacific as railroad stock looks 'too compelling to ignore'
items.description: Citi analyst Ariel Rosa cited more clarity around Union Pacific's merger with Norfolk Southern as a major catalyst for the stock.

items.title: Broadcom will outperform thanks to its dominance in the specialized chip market, Macquarie says
items.description: Macquarie sees a long runway of solid growth ahead for Broadcom.

items.title: An AI ‘house of cards’: Worries of a bubble grow after Oracle’s rally on OpenAI deal
items.description: OpenAI needs more than $300 billion in revenue to "justify" its level of spending, one analyst said.
